name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-versiondisplay
title: Displaying the version number in a web part
shortDescription: This very simple sample demonstrates three different approaches to display the version number of your SharePoint solution in your web part.
longDescription: This very simple sample demonstrates three different approaches to display the version number of your SharePoint solution in your web part.

thumbnails.alt: Displaying the version number in a web part

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
